Feature Attributions (SHAP, LIME, and TreeInterpreter)
--------------------------------------------------------

These demonstrations of different feature attribution methods in scikit-explain
are generated from tutorial notebooks that are `available on GitHub <https://github.com/monte-flora/scikit-explain/blob/master/tutorial_notebooks/feature_contributions.ipynb>`_


.. toctree::
    :glob:
    :maxdepth: 1

    notebooks/feature_contributions
